property.name: text
property.value:
This model carries out constrained simple linear regression on a data set, drawn from a black box model. n data points, {(xi, yi), i = 1,..., sampleSize} are obtained from a black-box system. The goal is to fit a linear model
y = a*x + b
to the data, also known as the "best" line, in the least-square sense. The corresponding optimization problem becomes: find {a*,b*} such that the residual sum of squares (RSS),
\sum_{i=1}^samplesSize{(yi - (a*xi+b))^2}
is minimized, subject to constraints, g(a,b,x)>0. The CompositeOptimizer performs gradient descent estimation of the optimal parameter set {a*,b*}, subject to g(.).

entity.name: CompositeOptimizer
entity.doc: Optimize the objective function provided in the inside composite, subject to constraints and precision/iteration limits

svg.text: Assume a linear model y = a*x + b. We are trying to fit a,b that minimize the sum of squares of errors, \sum (y-ysamples)^2, under this model, for the given set of x's. The parameters port in this example produces a tuple {a,b} at each iteration, that are the optimization variables.

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
